title: Mobile Education Leveraging Visual Callouts for Information Literacy Improvement

context.additional_context: A program enhancing information retrieval and evaluation skills in the social sciences domain for in-service professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can search for topic-related materials in a digital library interface with 90% accuracy within two weeks
Learners can explain how to analyze the credibility of information sources using a four-level evaluation criteria
Learners can identify key information within 3 seconds using microlearning content with callout indicators on mobile devices
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
